markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 630 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Darkness effects extinguish non-magical light in the area, and can [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) less powerful magical [light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100). You must usually target light magic with your darkness magic directly to counteract the light, but some darkness spells automatically attempt to counteract light.
name: Darkness

text: Darkness Source Core Rulebook pg. 630 4.0 Darkness effects extinguish non-magical light in the area, and can counteract less powerful magical light.
